cluster_information.name: Descriptor
cluster_information.description: This cluster describes an endpoint instance on the node, independently from other endpoints, but also allows composition of endpoints to conform to complex device type patterns.

struct_fields.name: DeviceType
struct_fields.description: This SHALL indicate the device type definition. The endpoint SHALL conform to the device type definition and cluster specifications required by the device type.

struct_fields.name: Revision
struct_fields.description: This is the implemented revision of the device type definition. The endpoint SHALL conform to this revision of the device type.

attributes.name: DeviceTypeList
attributes.description: This is a list of device types and corresponding revisions declaring endpoint conformance. At least one device type entry SHALL be present.

attributes.name: ServerList
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL list each cluster ID for the server clusters present on the endpoint instance.

attributes.name: ClientList
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL list each cluster ID for the client clusters present on the endpoint instance.

attributes.name: PartsList
attributes.description: This attribute indicates composition of the device type instance. Device type instance composition SHALL include the endpoints in this list.
